WELCOME.TITLE: Welcome to Horus
WELCOME.TEXT1: While this application is active it will send all the route that you make to the central services to trace the search that is being carried out.
WELCOME.TEXT2: To start click on the next button and scan the code of the group you belong to.
HOME.TEXT1: From this moment on your device is synchronizing the position for the GROUP
HOME.EXIT.TITLE: Confirm Exit
HOME.EXIT.DESCRIPTION: Are you sure to FINISH the Search? When finish the search, your device will STOP sending data to the server.
HOME.DIALOG.PHONENUMBER.TITLE: Phone Number
HOME.DIALOG.PHONENUMBER.SUBTITLE: Please, enter YOUR phone number.  It is necessary to establish a communication with you in case of need.
HOME.DIALOG.PHOTO.COMMENTS.TITLE: Description
HOME.DIALOG.PHOTO.COMMENTS.SUBTITLE: Add a description of the photo
HOME.DIALOG.COMMENTS.TITLE: Comments
HOME.DIALOG.COMMENTS.SUBTITLE: Put the comment you want to send
